info.author: Espen Moe-Nillssen
info.description:
Introduction
============

Integration of nivoslider_ in Plone

This version include nivoslider v3.0.1 (first responsive version)

It is used by collective.plonetruegallery


Credits
=======

Companies

* `Grieg Medialog <http://www.medialog.no>`_
* `Contact us <mailto:espen@medialog.no>`_
* `Planet Makina Corpus <http://www.makina-corpus.org>`_
* `Contact makina <mailto:python@makina-corpus.org>`_

Authors

- Espen Moe-Nilssen <espen@medialog.no>


Contributors

- JeanMichel FRANCOIS aka toutpt <toutpt@gmail.com>

.. _nivoslider: http://nivoslider.dev7studios.com

Changelog
=========

3.0.1.1 (2012-06-19)
--------------------

- Upgrade nivoslider to 3.0.1 [toutpt]
- Add demo page: use the provided buildout and hit /@@example.nivoslider [toutpt]


1.0 (2012-02-23)
----------------

- Initial release
info.keywords: nivo gallery nivoslider slider plone plonetruegallery
info.name: collective.js.nivoslider
info.summary: JQuery Nivogallery plugin as browser resource
